name: Top Down Fighter (Working Title)
description:
Version 0.01.1

- Improved tutorial a bit

BEFORE YOU PLAY

The tutorial is not finished, there are a couple of important things not yet mentioned, those are:

- You can shield by pressing RT, move it around with the left stick.

- You can alter the trajectory you fly after being hit, holding into the hit will make you fly less far and holding out means you fly further. Use this to escape combo's.

- If you get hit after having hit a wall you will receive less hitstun from follow up hits, until the moment you get out of hitstun again.

I still recommend starting with the tutorial though.

NEXT BIG UPDATE (Version 0.02)

Planned features of the next update are:

- Sound effects for the most important actions

- Improved tutorial

- New character (Using many of the same animations, but different specials and move properties)

- Other random changes I haven't decided on yet

(Some of these may be added in small updates in between)

Estimated update date: June 1st 2019

Game by: Lex de Kogel
